title: Grendel
attack1: Power: Any number of times during your turn, you may move 1 Emerald Gemstone between your Characters in play.
attack2: Midnight Massacre

title: Moby Dick
attack1: Power: Any number of times during your turn, you may attach 1 Sapphire Gemstone from your hand to one of your Sapphire Characters.
attack2: Breach - Deal 20 more damage for each additional Sapphire on Moby Dick.

title: Mothman
attack1: Power: While Mothman is your Active Character, your opponent can’t use Action Implement cards.
attack2: Prophetic Gaze – This attack’s damage is applied now and again to your opponent’s Active Character at the end of their next turn.

title: Rapunzel
attack1: Power: If Rapunzel is your Active Character and Switches, take 1 Ruby Gemstone on her and attach it to the new Active Character.
attack2: Maiden’s Grace - You may discard any number of Ruby Gemstones on Rapunzel when using this attack. This attack does damage times the number of Ruby Gemstones discarded this way.

title: The Wizard of Oz
attack1: Power: Once during your turn, you may change The Wizard's Gemstone type to 1 of your choosing until the end of your turn.
attack2: Lights and Mirrors

title: Briar Rose—Sleeping Beauty
attack1: Enchanted Slumber - Switch Briar Rose with one of your inactive Characters.
attack2: Thornveil Curse - This attack does damage times the number of Gemstones on Briar Rose.

title: Captain Nemo
attack1: Maelstrom Command - This attack does 1D4 damage to each Inactive Character, of both players, that isn't Sapphire.

title: Chupacabra
attack1: Vital Drain - Remove damage from Chupacabra equal to the damage done to the Defending Character.
attack2: Shadow Lurk

title: Glinda—The Good Witch
attack1: Blessing Light - The Defending Character is now Disabled.
attack2: Protective Orb - During your opponent’s next turn, prevent all damage and effects of attacks done to Glinda.

title: Jay Gatsby
attack1: Fixation - Discard 3 Gemstones on Gatsby to use this attack.

title: Snowy
attack1: Spirited Sniff - Draw a card.
attack2: Terrier Tackle

title: The Caterpillar
attack1: Smoke Rings - Flip a coin, if heads prevent all damage done to The Caterpillar during your opponent's next turn.
attack2: Who Are You? - Flip a coin, if tails The Caterpillar also does the damage to itself.

title: Thunderbird
attack1: Sky Guardian's Wrath - Flip a coin, if tails shuffle Thunderbird into your deck and discard all attached cards.

title: Alonso Quixano—Don Quijote
attack1: Delusory Strike - Flip a coin, if heads this attack does 2X times the damage.
attack2: Joust

title: Count Dracula
attack1: Power: When any attack would deal more than 20 damage to Dracula, prevent that damage (Effects still apply.)
attack2: Blood Taste - Divide the amount of damage on the defending character by 10. This attacks deal deal 1D4 times that that amount (rounded to the nearest 10).

title: Dogman
attack1: Power: Once during your turn you may attach a Ruby Gemstone from your discard pile to 1 of your Ruby Characters in play.
attack2: Stalk and Ambush

title: Dorothy Gale
attack1: Power: Once during your turn you may search your deck for a Character card and put it into play, then shuffle your deck.
attack2: Heel Click

title: Erik—Phantom of the Opera
attack1: Haunting Aria - Look at the top 3 cards of either player's deck and rearrange them as you like.
attack2: Abduction - As long as Erik is your Active Character, your opponent can’t switch out their Active Character.

title: Gulliver
attack1: Power: Once during your turn you may flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of your opponents Inactive Characters and switch it with their Active.
attack2: Giant’s Step

title: Hansel and Gretel
attack1: Power: While Hansel and Gretel are your Active Character their LP is doubled. If they become Inactive and their LP drops to 0 they are Blacked Out.
attack2: Crumb Trail - The defending Character cannot Switch while Hansel and Gretel remain Active.

title: Jackalope
attack1: Power: If an attack damages Jackalope while its your Active Character, flip a coin. If heads, the opponent's Active Character is Disabled; if tails, its Wounded.
attack2: Mirage - When Jackalope damages the Defending Character, heal Jackalope by half the damage dealt (rounded to the nearest 10th).

title: Juliet Capulet
attack1: Power: If Romeo Montague is in play, Juliet’s attacks deal 2X damage to the defending Character.
attack2: Secret Vow

title: King Arthur
attack1: Round Table Rally - If Merlin, Morgana le Fay, Sir Lancelot, or Sir Galahad are in play choose 1 of your opponent's Inactive Characters for each. This attack's damage also applies to those chosen.
attack2: Camelot's Blessing

title: Long John Silver
attack1: Power: As often as you like during your turn you may move 10 damage from this Character to another you control.
attack2: Double Cross - Does 20 damage to each Inactive character on the field. Does damage equal to half the damage taken by the defending Character to itself (rounded to the nearest 10th).

title: Morgana le Fay
attack1: Power: Once during your turn you may heal 20 damage from Morgana le Fay
attack2: Sorceress' Scheme - Flip a coin, if heads the defending Character is now Disabled.

title: Pukwudgie
attack1: Power: Once during your turn look at the top card of your opponent's deck. Then, you may have your opponent shuffle their deck.
attack2: Wicked Grin

title: Robin Hood
attack1: Power: All Gemstone cards attached to Robin Hood count as Ruby Gemstones.
attack2: Bull's Eye - Discard 2 Gemstones on Robin Hood to use this attack.

title: Romeo Montague
attack1: Power: If Juliet Capulet is in play, Romeo and any attached Gemstones aren't affected by any Implement cards.
attack2: Star Crossed Flame - Flip 3 coins and discard 1 Gemstone on Romeo for each tails.

title: Sasquatch
attack1: Power: If an opponent’s attack would Knock Out Sasquatch, flip a coin. If heads, shuffle it and all attached cards into your deck.
attack2: Primal Scream – Deal damage times the number of Gemstones on the defending Character. Heal Sasquatch for the same amount.

title: Sir Galahad
attack1: Power: All Gemstones on Sir Galahad count as Emerald Gemstones.
attack2: Reciprocation - If Sir Galahad took damage from the Defending Character in the prior turn, that Character is now Wounded.

title: The Cowardly Lion
attack1: Power: When you play The Lion from your hand, you may discard the top 5 cards of your deck. If there are any Ruby Gemstones, attach them to any of your Ruby Characters.
attack2: Found Courage - Discard 2 Ruby Gemstones on The Lion to use this attack.

title: The Kraken
attack1: Power: If an attack damages The Kraken while it's Active, you may switch it with 1 of your Inactive Characters, this prevents all other effects of that attack.
attack2: Capsize - Flip a coin, if heads your opponent's Active Character is now Disabled, if tails its wounded.

title: The Mad Hatter
attack1: Power: Once per turn you may choose a Gemstone on 1 of your Characters. Change the type of Gemstone to one of your choosing until the end of your turn.
attack2: Hat Trick: You may switch The Mad Hatter with one of your Inactive Characters.

title: The Scarecrow
attack1: Power: Whenever you attach a Topaz card to The Scarecrow, your opponent chooses 1 of their Inactive Characters, if any, and switches it with their Active.
attack2: Featherbrain Finesse - Flip a coin, if tails The Scarecrow does 1D4 damage to itself.

title: The Tin Woodsman
attack1: Power: Prevent all effects of your opponent's attacks, other than damage, done to The Tin Woodsman.
attack2: Heart of Steel - The defending Character is now disabled.

title: The Wicked Witch of the West
attack1: Wicked Hex - Flip a coin, if it is heads the defending Character is now wounded.
attack2: Emerald Enmity - Choose a type of Gemstone. This attack does 1D6 damage to each of your opponent's Characters with any Gemstones of that type on it.

title: Toto
attack1: Power: At any time during your turn, you may attach Toto to another character. If you do, choose a Gemstone and Toto becomes a 2-Gemstone card of that kind instead of a character.
attack2: Ankle Bite - Flip a coin, if tails Toto does 10 damage to himself.

title: Athos–Comte de la Fère
attack1: Noble Duel
attack2: Shadow of the Past - Athos takes 20 damage. If your opponent has Inactive Characters, they choose 1 to switch with their Active (Apply damage before switching).

title: Beowulf
attack1: Slash
attack2: Stab

title: Cinderella
attack1: Glass Slipper Strike - Flip a coin, if tails this attack does nothing.
attack2: Midnight Miracle

title: D'Artagnan–Charles de Batz de Castelmore
attack1: Musketeer’s Oath
attack2: Gallant Rush - Does 10 damage to each of your inactive Characters.

title: Jim
attack1: Mississippi Drift – Flip a coin, if heads prevent all damage to Jim during your opponent’s next turn (Effects still apply.)
attack2: Heavy Chain – Flip a coin, if heads the Defending Character is now Disabled.

title: Johnny Appleseed
attack1: Seed Toss - Attach up to 2 Emerald Gemstones from your hand to 1 of your Emerald Characters.
attack2: Hardy Resolve

title: Jonathan Harker
attack1: Vampiric Knowledge - During your next turn attacks on the Defending Character by your Characters do 2x the damage.
attack2: Resolute Strike - Discard 2 Ruby Gemstones on Jonathan to use this attack.

title: Little Red Riding Hood
attack1: Scarlet Cloak Swish - You may return any 1 of your Characters in play and all cards attached to your hand.
attack2: Wolfslayer Strike

title: Nick Carraway
attack1: Moral Mirror – If the defending Character attacked last turn while Nick was in play, Nick copies that attack (Ignoring resource costs and any other requirements).

title: Paul Bunyan
attack1: Timber Cleave - The defending Character is now Wounded.
attack2: Lumberjack Swing

title: Porthos–Senior du Vallon
attack1: Over the Top Slash – Flip a coin, if heads Porthos deals half this attack’s damage to himself (rounded to the nearest 10th).

title: Professor Abraham Van Helsing
attack1: Holy Stake - Does damage equal to half the defending Character's remaining LP (rounded to the nearest 10th).
attack2: Flip 2 coins. This attack does the damage times the number of heads.

title: Sherlock Holmes
attack1: Its a Trap - Flip a coin. if tails Sherlock deals 1D4 damage to himself.
attack2: Case Closed - Discard all Gemstones on Sherlock to use this attack.

title: Sinbad
attack1: Tidal Dodge - Deals damage equal to the amount of damage on Sinbad.
attack2: Storm Sweep - Discard 2 Gemstones on Sinbad. This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent’s Inactive Characters. Then flip a coin, if heads discard 1 Gemstone from each damaged.

title: Sir Lancelot
attack1: Dark Knight's Charge
attack2: Loyal Champion - If Merlin, Morgana le Fay, King Arthur, or Sir Galahad are in play this attack deals an additional 1D6 damage for each.

title: The Queen of Hearts
attack1: Royal Rage
attack2: Courtroom Chaos - Flip a coin, if heads prevent all damage and effects of attacks during your opponent's next turn done to The Queen of Hearts.

title: The Sandman
attack1: Sleeping Sand - The defending Character is now Disabled.
attack2: Nightmare - If the defending Character is Disabled this attack does 2X the damage and that character is no longer disabled.

title: Aladdin
attack1: Unlikely Escape - If your opponent has any Inactive characters, choose 1 of them and switch it with their Active character.
attack2: Wish - Discard 2 Ruby Gemstones on Aladdin to use this attack.

title: Ali Baba
attack1: Sharp Strike - Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does double damage; if tails, this attack does 1/2 the damage (rounded to the nearest 10th).
attack2: Open Sesame - Discard any amount of Ruby Gemstones on your Characters, do 1D4 times the number of cards discarded this way.

title: Alice
attack1: Curious Tumble
attack2: Croquet Mallet Smash - Discard 1 Gemstone on Alice to use this attack.

title: Anne Shirley—Of Green Gables
attack1: Lake of Shining Waters - Discard 2 Gemstones on Anne, remove all damage from Anne.
attack2: Imaginative Flare

title: Aramis–René d'Herblay
attack1: Sacred Vow
attack2: Elegant Riposte

title: Captain Ahab
attack1: This attack does 20 more damage for each additional Sapphire Gemstone on Captain Ahab.
attack2: Discard a Gemstone from your Opponent's defending Character.

title: Daisy Buchanan
attack1: Glittering Allure - During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage and effects of attacks, done to Daisy.
attack2: Emotional Fallout - If this attack doesn't Knock Out the Defending Character switch your opponent’s Active Character with one of their Inactive.

title: Doctor Moreau
attack1: Unnatural Command
attack2: Sinister Experiment - Discard all Gemstones on Moreau to use this attack.

title: Dorian Gray
attack1: Veil of Vanity - Deal 1D4 damage plus 1D4 for each Gemstone on the Defending Character.
attack2: Timeless Mask - Discard 1 Amethyst Gemstone on Dorian. During your opponent’s next turn, prevent all damage and effects of attacks on Dorian.

title: Dr. Henry Jekyll
attack1: Serum Study - Flip a coin, if heads the defending Character is now Injured.
attack2: Moral Calculation

title: Dr. John H. Watson
attack1: Field Medic - Flip a coin, if heads heal 1D6 from all your characters; if tails, heal 1D4 instead.
attack2: Case Notes

title: Frankenstein’s Monster
attack1: Galvanic Surge - Does 1D4 damage times the amount of damage on Frankenstein’s Monster.
attack2: Body of Many - After damage, your opponent switches their Active Character with one of their Inactive, if any. Then, you may do the same.

title: Goatman
attack1: Cleave
attack2: Backwoods Shadow - This attack does damage multiplied by the number of Inactive Characters you have in play.

title: Gunpowder
attack1: Unnerved Kick
attack2: Old But Willing - Flip a coin, if heads this attack does 2x the damage.

title: Huckleberry Finn
attack1: Cut and Run - Flip a coin, if heads prevent all damge and effects of attacks to Huck Finn during your opponent’s next turn.
attack2: Reckless Abandon - Flip a coin, if tails Huck Finn deals half this attack’s damage to himself (rounded to the nearest 10th).

title: Ichabod Crane
attack1: Panic Barrage
attack2: Candlelight Cower

title: Jim Hawkins
attack1: Treasure Trail – Shuffle Jim and all attached cards into your deck. Then, choose a card from your discard pile and shuffle it into your deck.
attack2: Mutiny Counter – If Jim Hawkins took damage last turn, this attack deals double damage.

title: Lizard Man
attack1: Murky Lurk - If your opponent has any Inactive Characters, choose 1 and switch it with the defending Character. Its now disabled.
attack2: Stuck in the Mud - The defending Character is now Wounded and cannot switch during your opponent's next turn.

title: Merlin
attack1: Mystic Invocation - Take up to 2 Topaz Gemstones from your discard pile and attach them to Merlin.
attack2: Druidic Blessing - Take 1 Topaz Gemstone on Merlin and move it to 1 of your Inactive Characters.

title: Mina Harker
attack1: Holy Grace - Discard 1 Sapphire Gemstone from Mina to heal all damage from her.
attack2: Shared Curse – This attack deals damage times the number of Dracula, Jonathan Harker, and Professor Van Helsing cards in play.

title: Mr. Hyde
attack1: If Mr. Hyde is damaged by an attack during your opponent’s next turn (even if Blacked Out), the defending Character takes the same amount of damage.

title: Pecos Bill
attack1: Sharpshot - This attack does 1D6 damage to any 1 of your opponent's Characters in play.

title: Professor James Moriarty
attack1: Calculated Trap – Flip a coin, if heads, this attack deals 3X the damage.
attack2: The Spider’s Web – During your opponent’s next turn, if the defending Character is switched out this attack’s damage is dealt again to new Active Character.

title: Rip Van Winkle
attack1: Timeless Drift - Flip a coin, if heads the defending Character is now disabled.
attack2: Wistful Recall - Does damage times the number of Gemstones on the Defending Character. After damage, heal Rip Van Winkle equal to the damage done.

title: Rose Red
attack1: Rain Burst - This attack does 1D4 more damage for each additional Gemstone, if any, attached.

title: Rumpelstilzchen
attack1: Golden Spin - Flip a coin, if heads the defending Character is now Disabled.
attack2: Dealbreaker - You may discard all attached Gemstones, if you do this attack does 2x the damage.

title: Sancho Panza
attack1: Simple Wisdom - Choose one of the defending Character's attacks. That character can't use that attack during your opponent's next turn.
attack2: Pragmatic Spirit

title: Snow White
attack1: Mirror’s Truth - You may flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 2X the damage. If tails, the attack does nothing.

title: The Cheshire Cat
attack1: Copy Cat - Choose 1 of the defending Character’s attacks. Use that attack without paying its costs or meeting other requirements.
attack2: Fade to Black - Deals damage equal to the amount of damage on the defending Character.

title: The Dormouse
attack1: Sleepy Time Tea – The defending Character is now Disabled.
attack2: Feed Your Head – If the defending Character is Disabled and was attacked by Dormouse last turn, deal damage equal to the defending Character’s remaining LP.

title: The Headless Horseman
attack1: Pumpkin Requiem - Flip 3 coins, deal damage times the number of heads.
attack2: Dread Pursuit - For each Inactive Character in play (yours and your opponent's), flip a coin. If heads, this attack also damages that Character.

title: The Ugly Duckling
attack1: Graceful Wake - Put 1D4 damage on each of your opponent's Characters that already have any damage on them.
attack2: Swan Song - If this attack doesn't knock out the defending character your opponent shuffles it into their deck and discards any attached cards.

title: The White Rabbit
attack1: Tea Time Rush
attack2: Pocket Watch Slam

title: Tom Sawyer
attack1: Fence Painting - Flip a coin, if heads this attack does 2X the damage.
attack2: Wild Adventure - Flip a coin, if heads the defending Character is now wounded.

title: Victor Frankenstein
attack1: Forbidden Spark - You may search your deck for a Topaz Gemstone and attach it to 1 of your Topaz Characters, then shuffle your deck.
attack2: Monomaniacal Focus

title: Will-o'-the-wisp
attack1: Spirit Flicker - If an attack damages Will-o'-the-wisp during your opponent's next turn prevent all damage done to Will-o'-the-wisp (Other effects apply).
attack2: Forest Phantom - Deal 1D6 damage for each Gemstone on the defending Character.

title: The Pictureof Dorian Gray
effect: The Character this is attached to gets gains Life Points equal to half their base LP.

title: The Woods
effect: All damage received from active Characters' attacks is reduced by 20.

title: Bray Road
effect: Switch costs for each player's characters are increased by 1.

title: Camelot
effect: Anytime a player's Gemstone is to be discarded, return the card to the player's hand.

title: Elixir of Life
effect: Remove 40 damage from one of your Characters. That Character is no longer wounded or disabled.

title: Emerald City
effect: Once during each player's turn, that player may flip a coin. If heads, that player draws a card.

title: Gatsby's Green Light
effect: Your Active Character is no longer wounded or disabled.

title: Hall of Records
effect: Discard 2 other cards from your hand to search your deck for any card, add it to your hand, then shuffle your deck.

title: Iron Mask
effect: If the Character this is attached to is Blacked Out, return that Character into your hand. (Discard all attached cards)

title: Mjölnir
effect: Draw 2 cards.

title: Moreau's Island
effect: Once during each player's turn , that player may look at the top 2 cards of their deck and put them back in any order.

title: The Book of Thoth
effect: Trade 1 of the other cards in your hand for up to 2 Gemstones in your discard pile.

title: The Golden Fleece
effect: Damage done to the Character this is attached to by an opponent's attack is reduced by 20.

title: The Magic Carpet
effect: Shuffle 2 of the other cards from your hand into your deck in order to draw a card.

title: The Nautilus
effect: Look at up to 5 cards from the top of your deck and rearrange them as you like.

title: The Red Badge of Courage
effect: Discard 1 Gemstone on 1 of your Characters in order to choose 1 of your opponent's Characters to discard 2 Gemstones on it.

title: The Spinning Wheel
effect: Your opponent shuffles their hand into their deck, then draws 7 cards. You may choose to do the same.

title: Tornado
effect: Switch your opponent’s active Character with one of their Inactive Characters.

title: Treasure Island
effect: Once during each player's turn, that player may flip a coin. If heads, that player puts a Gemstone from their discard pile into their hand.

title: Verona
effect: Once during each player's turn, they may discard 2 cards from their hand in order to draw 1 card from their deck.

title: Wonderland
effect: Once during each player's turn, they may flip a coin. If heads, that player removes 20 damage from their Active Character.

title: Dr. Frankenstein's Machine
effect: Discard 2 other cards from your hand to return an implement from your discard pile to your hand.

title: Excalibur
effect: Whenever an attack from the Character this is attached to does damage to your opponent's Active Character, the attack does 20 more damage.

title: Magic Mirror
effect: Switch 1 of your inactive characters with your active character.

title: Magic Mirror
effect: Switch your Active Character with 1 of your inactive characters.

title: Pandora’s Box
effect: Discard your hand, then draw 7 cards.

title: Silver Shoes
effect: Choose 1 of your Characters in play and return it to your hand. (Discard all cards attached to that card.)

title: Sleepy Hollow
effect: As often as each player likes during his or her turn, that player may return 1 Gemstone attached to 1 of their Characters to their hand.

title: The Time Machine
effect: Heal all your damaged characters, then discard all Gemstone cards on those that were healed.

title: Transylvania
effect: Switch costs for each player's characters are decreased by 1
